greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Row sums of triangle A049411.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..485
Vladimir Victorovich Kruchinin, Composition of ordinary generating functions, arXiv:1009.2565 [math.CO], 2010.
W. Lang, On generalizations of Stirling number triangles, J. Integer Seqs., Vol. 3 (2000), #00.2.4.
formula: a(n) = n! * Sum_{k=1..n} Sum_{j=0..k} binomial(6*j,n) *(-1)^(k-j)/ (6^k*(k-j)!*j!). - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Feb 07 2011
mathematica: a[n_, m_] := BellY[n, m, Table[k! Binomial[5, k], {k, 0, nmax}]];
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
ext: Offset adjusted by _R. J. Mathar_, Aug 29 2009
